text: Hello-Goodbye is a 1970 British comedy movie. It was directed by Jean Negulesco. Actors include Michael Crawford, Genevieve Gilles, Curd Jürgens, Princess Ira von Fürstenberg, and Jeffry Wickham. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1970 comedy movies Category:British comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jean Negulesco
title: Hello-Goodbye
